name: Global News Network
description: Global News Network (GNN) provides 24/7 rolling news coverage from around the world. Stay informed with live reports, in-depth analysis, and exclusive interviews.

name: Sports Arena TV
description: The ultimate destination for sports fans. Watch live matches, highlights, and expert commentary for football, basketball, cricket, and more.

name: CineMax HD
description: Your 24/7 channel for blockbuster movies, from timeless classics to modern hits, all in stunning high definition.
